name: Mila
0:
”Alexa, set the fan speed to Minimum on the Bedroom Mila”
”Alexa, what's the temperature in the nursery?”
”Alexa, tell Mila to pause”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mila
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get ready to breathe even easier with Mila skill for Amazon Alexa. Use this skill to learn more about the air you breathe — indoors and outdoors — and control your Mila by voice. 

Tip: Get started by selecting the “Enable Skill” button in the Alexa App to link your Mila Air account. You’ll need your Mila username and password. To learn more or if you need additional assistance, please visit us at https://help.milacares.com.
Just ask Alexa:

"Discover my devices"

Mila Controls:

Mila Controls:

"Set the fan speed to Minimum on the Bedroom Mila"

"Set Office Mila to Automagic"

"Set the fan speed to 10 on the Bedroom Mila"

"Turn on/off white noise on the Office Mila"

"Turn on/off child lock on the Office Mila"

"What's the temperature in the Main Bedroom?"

"What's the temperature in the Main Bedroom?"

"What's the CO level in the office?"

"What's the humidity in the nursery?"

"Is the child lock on in the Office?"

Scenes:

"Activate/deactivate Deep Clean in Main Bedroom"

"Activate/deactivate Child Lock everywhere"

"Activate/deactivate White Noise everywhere"

Important: When you enable smart home skills on your Alexa device, anyone speaking to your device can operate those products. Before you enable a smart home skill, please read Safety Information for Using Smart Home Devices with Alexa.
To learn more about the devices you can control with Alexa, see "Supported Smart Home Devices for Alexa": https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201819970


Here are even more asks Mila skill for Amazon Alexa can help you with:

Alexa, ask Mila what my air quality is?
Alexa, ask Mila what's the outdoor air quality?
Alexa, ask Mila to Deep Clean.
Alexa, tell Mila to pause/resume.
Alexa, tell Mila to start/turn off Child Lock.
Alexa, ask Mila to set Whitenoise Mode.
Alexa, ask Mila to change the fan speed to 30%.
Alexa, ask Mila what can you do?

You can specify the room for most of the commands, for example, "Alexa, tell Mila to pause/resume in the kitchen.", or "Alexa, ask Mila to set Whitenoise Mode in the baby room."
